title: Trillion Dollar Thoroughbreds Vs. Bank Stock Nags
text: Amazon, Microsoft and Apple rate equally with Secretariat whose oversized heart carried him down the middle of the track, 31 lengths ahead of also-rans in the 1973 Belmont Stakes. Alphabet disappoints, Boeing has thrown his jockey and AT&T pulled up lame.

title: Cramer: Trump's tariff threat sent investors running to domestic stocks Monday — that's a good sign
text: When the averages got hit this morning on new Chinese worries, people almost instantly pulled out their shopping lists and started buying high quality domestic stocks that have nothing to do with the trade war,” CNBC’s Jim Cramer says.

title: Nasdaq on the future of technology and the exchanges
text: Long thought of as a digital marketplace for buying and selling securities, Nasdaq has used the large volumes of data available to it to leverage itself into an intermediary source for market structure, exchange and settlement for markets of all types.

title: Digital Media Guru Laments Era Of "Fake Entrepreneurship"
text: Lamenting the rise of "fake entrepreneurship," wine critic turned author, investor and internet personality Gary Vaynerchuk delivered a funny, provocative critique of today's overheated startup scene as well as legacy companies that fail to recognize the disruptive potential of innovation.

title: Dow Jones Pares 471-Point Loss; Stock Market Resilient Despite China Uncertainty
text: The stock market recovered nicely Monday after an early swoon. Sentiment was negative early after President Trump threatened more China tariffs.

title: Bernie Madoff's wife Ruth settles with court-appointed trustee
text: Wife of imprisoned swindler Bernie Madoff agreed to pay $594,000 and surrender her remaining assets when she dies to settle claims by the court-appointed trustee liquidating her husband's firm.

title: A Chat With The CSO Of Grown Rogue, A 'Seed-To-Experience Multistate Cannabis Operator'
text: Chief Strategy Officer Jacques Habra joined Grown Rogue in early 2017, a few months after the founders converted a medical cannabis operation into a recreational marijuana company.

title: Starbucks' China rival Luckin seeks to raise up to $586.5 million in IPO
text: Luckin Coffee, the Chinese challenger to Starbucks, is looking to raise up to $586.5 million, its filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange on Monday showed.

title: NGM Biopharmaceuticals And NGM282 In NASH, And The Market Assessment
text: Liver Therapy Forum digest provides an overview of what's happening in the NASH landscape in 2019. This week focuses on NGM Biopharmaceuticals.

title: Health tech start-up uBiome suspends clinical operations following FBI raid
text: uBiome has temporarily suspended clinical operations, and will stop selling its SmartJane and SmartGut tests until further notice.

title: A Beginner's Guide to Value Investing
text: A deep look at what value investing really is and how you can use this strategy to improve your returns and reduce your risk of permanent losses.

title: Report: China Wants A Piece Of The CBD Market
text: Although pot remains taboo in China, the country is making appreciable inroads in the cannabis industry, according to The New York Times.

title: How Wall Street Views Breakdown in China Trade Talks
text: The breakdown of trade talks with China remains up for interpretation. The U.S. market reaction to tweets from President Donald Trump on Sunday was muted compared to what was seen in Asia.

title: Deep Dive: Here are the biggest stock-market losers after Trump threatens more tariffs
text: China is still sending a trade delegation to Washington, but investors panicked Monday morning.

title: Today's Pickup: France is banning electric scooters on the street pavement
text: Good day, The global pushback on the electric scooter craze has reverberated in France as well, with the country set to ban all electric scooters from running on its pavements from September.

title: The Milestone Pharma IPO: What You Need To Know
text: There’s a new pharma investment on the Street.

title: S&P 500, Nasdaq Set All-Time Intraday Highs But Risky Levels Loom
text: This is a warning that the next 10% to 20% is to the downside and investors should lock in gains on at least 50% of their investment portfolios.

title: Here Are Warren Buffett's Most Inspirational Quotes
text: Warren Buffett is the Oracle of Omaha. Here are his 10 greatest quotes.

title: Sell In May? This Data Says Not So Fast
text: Experts are divided as to whether or not the sell in May trade is worth following in 2019.

title: Grocery startup BigBasket becomes India’s newest unicorn with new $150M investment
text: India has a new unicorn after BigBasket, a startup that delivers groceries and perishables across the country, raised $150 million for its fight against rivals Walmart’s Flipkart, Amazon and hyperlocal startups Swiggy and Dunzo.

title: The Giant Cannabis Problem No One Saw Coming
text: States like Oregon and Washington have too much cannabis and not enough demand.

title: A Major Newspaper Fires Its Entire Staff
text: The Times-Picayune, the primary newspaper in New Orleans, was founded in 1837. It was just announced that it had been sold to its major rival.

title: How Hedge Funds Became The Villains On Wall Street
text: Thirty years ago, private equity barons like Henry Kravis and George Roberts were considered the bad guys on Wall Street.
